name: Paul Sauer 2013
description: Regarded as a SA ‘first growth’ Bordeaux-style blend, traditionally Cabernet-based with Cabernet Franc, Merlot, as in 2013. Reflects vintage’s bright fruit; elegantly spiced Cabernet berries. Fresher, less muscular than 2012 but no shortage of potential.' - Platter's SA Wine Guide 2017, 4.5☆ The wines will be cellared at Wine Cellar (Professional wine storage, Cape Town) vintage cellar until maturity (estimated 2028) or withdrawal.
